description: FAA Part 117: Flightcrew Member Duty and Rest Requirements

rolling_365_day.description: 1000 hours in any 365 consecutive calendar days

fdp_limits.description: Flight Duty Period maximum limits based on start time and number of segments

unaugmented.note: FDP limits for unaugmented operations (single crew)

augmented.note: FDP limits for augmented operations (additional crew rest facilities)

class_1_rest_facility.description: Class 1 rest facility: flat bed, horizontal, separate from cockpit/cabin

class_2_rest_facility.description: Class 2 rest facility: flat or near flat, separate from passengers

class_3_rest_facility.description: Class 3 rest facility: seat with leg and foot support

minimum_rest.description: Minimum rest period before beginning a flight duty period

rules.condition: FDP scheduled for 9 hours or less
rules.note: At least 10 consecutive hours of rest

rules.condition: FDP scheduled for more than 9 hours but less than or equal to 13 hours
rules.note: At least 11 consecutive hours of rest

rules.condition: FDP scheduled for more than 13 hours
rules.note: At least 12 consecutive hours of rest

56_hour_rest.description: 56-hour rest requirement after consecutive nighttime operations
56_hour_rest.trigger: After 3 consecutive flight duty periods that infringe on the WOCL

wocl.description: Window of Circadian Low - Period of maximum sleepiness
wocl.note: Time period when most humans experience peak sleepiness (2AM-6AM local time)

consecutive_nighttime_operations.definition: Flight duty period that encroaches on the WOCL
consecutive_nighttime_operations.description: After 3 consecutive FDPs that infringe on WOCL, crew must have 56 hours rest including 3 local nights

airport_reserve.description: Reserve at airport cannot exceed 14 hours

short_call_reserve.definition: Reserve with less than 2 hours notification
short_call_reserve.description: Short call reserve limited to 14 hours in any 24-hour period

long_call_reserve.definition: Reserve with 2 hours or more notification
long_call_reserve.description: Long call reserve has no specific hourly limit but must respect FDP limits

60_consecutive_days.description: Max 190 FDP hours in any 60 consecutive days

unforeseen_circumstances.description: Extensions allowed for unforeseen operational circumstances
conditions: Must be unforeseen at time of crew scheduling
Cannot be used to reschedule known operational issues
Subsequent rest must be increased by amount of extension

split_duty.description: FDP may be extended with split duty rest opportunity
conditions: Rest must occur between 2200-0500 home base time
FDP extension cannot exceed actual time resting

fitness_for_duty.crew_responsibility: Flightcrew member must report for duty rested and prepared
fitness_for_duty.certificate_holder_responsibility: Certificate holder must provide adequate rest opportunities

fatigue_reporting.description: Certificate holder must have fatigue risk management system
